description.value:
Special: Toxic (2), Blast (6)

Note: Heretical Weapon of Nurgle. Damage Ignores Armour if it is not Environmentally Sealed, produces a toxic cloud when it detonates that lasts for 1d10 Rounds. Anyone who enters the cloud takes 1d10 E Damage with Toxic Quality (also ignores non-sealed armour)
